[2. - burn to usb]

Okay, you now got the files. What do you to next? Follow the steps and you will have a working windows 10 beta copy.

1. grab random usb you have in your house
2. insert rufus
3. burn said iso image to said usb stick. (at least 5-18 gigs, recommended)
4. reboot pc and hit ESC, or whatever model it is to get to bios.
5. disable secure boot
6. enable legacy support (for safe mesures and no risking bios damage)
7. install said copy of said burned iso image into c:/ drive 
8. activate windows 10 at log on. [TOO LAZY TO OPEN KEY FILE? | 6P99N-YF42M-TPGBG-9VMJP-YKHCF |]
9. said iso image and said copy of windows 10 beta is now installed now. enjoy :-)
